title: Gale's Fury & Shadow's Embrace
story: The castle groans under the relentless assault of the tempest. The raging winds and torrents of rain provide perfect cover for the creatures that lurk within its crumbling walls.
effect: While this card is active, any hero attempting a Combat action rolls 1 fewer D6 (minimum 1 D6) due to the storm's disorienting effects. Furthermore, each Vampire Sister's movement range is increased by 1 step while this card is active.
